name: Guitar Picks
description:
This a Puzzle-Turn-based-Rogue-like, your energy is limited. Collect as many guitar picks as you can.

Control are limited to arrow keys.

Beers and Horns Sign will help you, beware of the angry elders who dislike the mess in their park the previous days. They will beat you up with their stick and their zimmer frame. Use the water puddle to make them slip and fell down.

Good Luck !!
